heading: HB07964
0: AN ACT EXEMPTING SENIOR CITIZENS AND PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES FROM TRAVEL TAX
status: Pending with the Committee on TOURISM since 2018-08-01
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07964
FULL TITLE : AN ACT EXEMPTING SENIOR CITIZENS AND PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES FROM TRAVEL TAX
ABSTRACT : Seeks to reduce the financial burden of travelling Senior Citizens and PWDs by exempting them form travel tax.
ALIAS NAME : “Tax-Free Travel for Senior Citizens and PWDs Act.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GASATAYA, GREG G.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-25
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
